pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Nordic Blonde Anti-Yellow Toner
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf C3 Nordic Blonde Anti-Yellow Toner with Omegaplex Anti-breakage technology that can remove yellow gold tones while conditioning hair and visibly improved hair quality.

Thanks to its unique formula with blue violet pigments and OMEGAPLEX Anti-Breakage Technology, Nordic BlondeAnti-Yellow Toner removes unwanted yellow gold tones, adds condition and visibly improves hair quality:

- A cooler, brighter and healthy looking blonde.

- Suitable for use on blonde, lightened or highlighted hair.

- Ideal for reviving and brightening naturally grey or whitehair and toning sun bleached hair.

Suitable For: Suitable for use on blonde, lightened or highlighted hair.

Size: 200mL

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-8, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Methylparaben, Parfum, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil, Polyquaternium-6, Propylparaben, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Magnesium Chloride,
Citric Acid, Amodimethicone/Morpholinomethyl Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Sodium Chloride, Trideceth-5, Magnesium Citrate, Sodium Sulfate, Acid Violet 43.

Directions

After shampooing, massage a generous amount through hair. Leave in for 1-5 minutes and rinse thoroughly.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Not recommended for use on highly bleached or very porous hair. Do not allow Nordic Blonde Anti-Yellow Toner to come into contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. In the event of spillage, rinse immediately with cold water.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
